name: Pendulum
blurb: Incarnate a left-for-dead fugitive wanting to discover the truth in a 3D adventure-platform game. From easy to hell: try to defeat all!

rewards.reward: \u201cYou know what they say: \u2018every little deed counts\u2019. Thanks to that, each dollar you\u2019ll give us will give you in exchange 2 Chips every time you wanna begin a new game. It will be incremented as an option, then of course, if you don\u2019t want this handicap, feel free to go to the settings and disable it. You\u2019ll be able to enable it again for your next game: just don\u2019t forget to do so.\u201d - Kim.

\u201cHa ha ha! This is getting interesting. Not mentioning what\u2019s above, you now shall be mentioned in the credits as a member of the great family that helped our legacy to be known all over the Universe. Of course, your name will be a little more\u2026 stealthy\u2026 than the team\u2019s, for not shadowing them for I\u2019m sure your name will glow with power and purity. Don\u2019t be shy and accept it, please!\u201d - Carlos.

\u201cHmm\u2026 I see. Even mentioning your name isn\u2019t enough\u2026 Then, let me welcome you to the circle of recognised two-or-plus-figures-number-of-dollars-backers, where everyone will have access to our development diaries, to see the team slacking off, er\u2026 I mean, to see the team will work really hard to make this legacy to be transmitted onto generations.\u201d - Rudy.

\u201cHehehe\u2026 *smirks* You\u2019ve unlocked the first \u2018first traveler\u2019 special price that authorizes you to win everything written on the next tier. Let\u2019s see what you gained just below.\u201d - Elena.
\u201cCongratulations! You may now obtain a copy of the game when the X-Day will come, along with everything already noted above. Hope you\u2019re looking forward to playing it!\u201d - Dmitri.

\u201cOkay, now this is starting to become invasive. I\u2019m not against giving the game and credits at a low price, but also letting people participate to polls for the development and a digital copy of the soundtrack on top of that. Well, for what I care\u2026 I just hope you\u2019ll enjoy them, even if it\u2019s cheap.\u201d - Esmeralda.

\u201cHehehe\u2026 *smirks* You\u2019ve unlocked the second \u2018first traveler\u2019 special price that authorizes you to win everything written on the next tier. Let\u2019s see what you gained just below.\u201d - Elena.

\u201cBrace yourself! Additionally to the previous tiers, you will now have access to the beta of the game. Plus, you will be ranked as a \u2018gold donor\u2019, giving you a space as big as the team members\u2019 in the credits.\u201d - Hanuman.

\u201cHehehe\u2026 *smirks* You\u2019ve unlocked the third \u2018first traveler\u2019 special price that authorizes you to win everything written on the next tier. Let\u2019s see what you gained just below.\u201d - Elena.

\u201cSo it\u2019s my turn to speak? Then, know that with the previous stuff, you\u2019ll have another option in the setting menu allowing you to have a random upgrade at the beginning of a game. Ah! And you get 3 Chips per dollar, instead of 2. Well then, I\u2019m off.\u201d - Alacranes.

\u201cWhy so generous? Then, let me this time welcome you to the circle of fairly recognised three-or-plus-figures-number-of-dollars-backers, where everyone will have access, not only to the previous tiers\u2019 rewards, but also to another option in the game for a random item and, at last but not least, an access to development livestream conversations.\u201d - Rudy.

\u201cHehehe\u2026 *smirks* You\u2019ve unlocked the fourth \u2018first traveler\u2019 special price that authorizes you to win everything written on the next tier. Let\u2019s see what you gained just below.\u201d - Elena.

\u201cBe prepared! In addition to the previous tiers, you will now have an early access to the beta of the game. Plus, you will be ranked as a \u2018platinum donor\u2019, giving you an even bigger space as the team members\u2019 in the credits. What\u2019s more? You will have another option of getting a random epic weapon in the game.\u201d - Hanuman.

\u201cHehehe\u2026 *smirks* You\u2019ve unlocked the fifth and last \u2018first traveler\u2019 special price that authorizes you to win everything written on the next tier. Let\u2019s see what you gained just below.\u201d - Elena.

\u201cHey! What\u2019s up? Are you not excited for attacking the highest tiers? From here, anything you do may have an impact for the game. Wanna try to put your creativity in our story? For this tier, we only give the possibility of naming a character or enemy of the game. Of course, it will need approval and you\u2019re not obligated to do it. Even just the thought is encouraging. Plus, you will be rewarded at least with an increased currency ratio: every dollar given will be rewarded with 4 Chips. It\u2019s obvious that the lower tiers\u2019 stuff will also be yours.\u201d - Flora.

\u201cThis is marvelous! Let me give you the classy seat of the greatest family of the four-or-plus-figures-number-of-dollars-backers. In addition to have access to the previous tiers\u2019 rewards, you will be able to completely design a character for the game and be mentioned in the credits as an assistant developer. However, this seat is limited. Try to get it!\u201d - Rudy.

\u201cNice! Not forgetting the previous tiers\u2019 stuff, you will be able to design a boss, rare enemy, or rare weapon or item. You\u2019ll be mentioned as an assistant developer, like in the previous tier. Just remember that you can choose only one.\u201d - Flora.

\u201cThe highest possible tier. For a donation this big, your dollar amount in Chips will increase tenfold. Absolutely everything will be included in this formula: from the lowest tier to this one. In this one, we\u2019ll grant you with a personal contact with the developers, early peeks into the game and development, plus a premium access into the game for testing.\u201d - Kim.
